decks.notes: This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo involving cards like Nadu, Winged Wisdom, Nomads en-Kor, and Shuko to create a loop of drawing cards and gaining life. Teferi, Time Raveler helps protect the combo pieces while cards like Force of Will provide disruption. Green Sun's Zenith can search for key combo pieces, with Brainstorm and Ponder helping to find them quickly. The deck also includes utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Urza's Saga to support the combo strategy. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game efficiently.

The deck focuses on utilizing Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill the opponent's library. It also includes cards like Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to fetch and recur key pieces. The deck runs disruptive spells like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast to protect the combo, along with removal like Lightning Bolt. Urza's Saga can fetch important artifacts, while Ancient Tomb provides ramp. Additional win conditions include Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. With a mix of control, combo, and synergy, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while executing its own game plan efficiently.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of artifacts, mana acceleration, and powerful spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It utilizes cards like Mox Opal and Lotus Petal to quickly ramp up mana, while cards like Lightning Bolt and Chandra's Incinerator help to control the board and deal with threats. The deck also utilizes powerful creatures like Minsc & Boo, Timeless Heroes and Broadside Bombardiers to pressure the opponent. The goal is to establish board control and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful spells.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck aims to quickly ramp up into powerful Eldrazi creatures using cards like Eldrazi Temple, Eye of Ugin, and Lotus Petal. By disrupting opponents with Chalice of the Void and Wasteland, and generating value with cards like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End, the deck seeks to overwhelm and outpace opponents in the Legacy format. The deck also includes ways to generate additional Eldrazi spawn tokens and mana to further power out threats, making it a formidable aggro deck in the format.

The deck focuses on using Painter's Servant and Grindstone to create a powerful combo that mills your opponent's deck. It also utilizes Goblin Welder and Goblin Engineer to manipulate artifacts and bring back key pieces from the graveyard. The deck includes disruption elements like Red Elemental Blast and Pyroblast to protect the combo, along with mana acceleration options like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide. Additionally, the deck includes tools like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Ensnaring Bridge to control the board and protect against opposing threats.

The main strategy of this Legacy deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Animate Dead, then bring them back to the battlefield with Reanimate. By utilizing powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with strong threats early in the game. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces. This deck relies on efficient card draw and manipulation with cards like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to execute its game plan effectively.

The deck focuses on using efficient mana ramp creatures like Noble Hierarch and Ignoble Hierarch to quickly accelerate mana production. It utilizes powerful creatures like Wight of the Reliquary and Springheart Nantuko to control the board and apply pressure. Natural Order allows for quick access to game-ending threats like Craterhoof Behemoth. The deck also includes cards like Endurance to disrupt graveyard strategies and Collector Ouphe to shut down artifact-based strategies. The goal is to outvalue the opponent through efficient creature plays and disruption while maintaining control of the game.

This deck focuses on using powerful reanimation spells like Animate Dead and Reanimate to quickly bring back big creatures like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty from the graveyard. It also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Grief to control the opponent's hand, as well as cards like Entomb to set up the graveyard. With strong combo potential and the ability to bring back key creatures early in the game, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a win.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Stifle, Sheoldred's Edict, and Orcish Bowmasters, while also utilizing card advantage with Mishra's Bauble, Ponder, and Brainstorm. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps filter through the deck, while Psychic Frog and Nethergoyf provide additional control elements. Force of Will and Daze are key cards for protecting your own game plan. The mana base is designed to support a smooth mana curve and take advantage of Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's lands.
